column4: CORRECTED-Web performance software company Cloudflare readies IPO -sources
column5: Oct 23 Cloudflare Inc  a U.S. startup whose software makes websites load faster and with greater security  is preparing for an initial public offering (IPO) that could value it at more than $3.5 billion  people familiar with the matter said.

column4: UPDATE 4-Tesla critic Citron makes U-turn ahead of results
column5: NEW YORK  Oct 23 Tesla Inc shares jumped more than 12 percent on Tuesday after long-time critic and short-seller Citron Research said it had a change of heart and is now betting the electric automaker's stock will rise.

column4: Long-time Tesla critic Citron Research goes "long" on stock
column5: Oct 23 Tesla Inc's shares rose nearly 4 percent on Tuesday  after long-time critic and short-seller Citron Research reversed its opinion on the stock to "long" from "short".

column4: China's EV maker Faraday Future plans lay-offs  20 percent pay cuts
column5: HONG KONG Faraday Future  a start-up that is developing electric vehicles (EV)  said on Tuesday it planned pay cuts of 20 percent for all staff  in addition to an unspecified number of lay-offs  in a bid to reduce operational costs.

column4: Elon Musk says Twitter had locked his account thinking it was hacked
column5: Tesla Inc  Chief Executive Elon Musk said Twitter had locked his account thinking it had been hacked.

column4: Elon Musk says Twitter had locked his account thinking it was hacked
column5: Oct 23 Tesla Inc Chief Executive Elon Musk said Twitter had locked his account thinking it had been hacked.

column4: UPDATE 1-China's EV maker Faraday Future plans lay-offs  20 pct pay cuts
column5: HONG KONG  Oct 23 Faraday Future  a start-up that is developing electric vehicles (EV)  said on Tuesday it planned pay cuts of 20 percent for all staff  in addition to an unspecified number of lay-offs  in a bid to reduce operational costs.

column4: Amazon.com  Qualcomm to put Alexa assistant in more headphones
column5: SAN FRANCISCO Microchip firm Qualcomm Inc  is joining Amazon.com Inc  to spread the use of Amazon's Alexa voice assistant in wireless headphones  the companies said on Monday.

column4: Amazon.com  Qualcomm to put Alexa assistant in more headphones
column5: SAN FRANCISCO  Oct 22 Microchip firm Qualcomm Inc is joining Amazon.com Inc to spread the use of Amazon's Alexa voice assistant in wireless headphones  the companies said on Monday.
